description: Stylesheet for managing themes and layout for a tic-tac-toe application, defining both light and dark theme variables, as well as styles for application components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling, including layout and theme-dependent properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application, defining its background color and layout properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, defining color transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, defining appearance and hover effects.
